description: This file defines the IButler interface and its nested INotification interface within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace. It declares methods for registering for notifications about IValuePoint elements, managing elements by name or ID, and performing operations like move, delete, and retrieving orphaned elements.

classes.name: IButler
classes.description: Interface for the Butler component that manages IValuePoint elements and notifies registered listeners about changes.

classes.name: IButler::INotification
classes.description: Interface for receiving notifications related to IValuePoint elements being added, removed, updated, or metadata changed.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Register a sink to receive notifications about element changes.

methods.name: Element (by name)
methods.description: Retrieve an IValuePoint by its name.

methods.name: Element (by id)
methods.description: Retrieve an IValuePoint by its ID.

methods.name: Source
methods.description: Get the source string for a given module.

methods.name: Branch
methods.description: Perform a branch operation on a given path.

methods.name: Link
methods.description: Create a link between a path and an ID.

methods.name: Move
methods.description: Move an element from one path to a new name.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Delete an element at the specified path.

methods.name: Orphans
methods.description: Retrieve an iterator over orphaned IValuePoints for a module.

ctags.name: IButler
ctags.pattern: /^		struct EXTERNAL IButler : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^			struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
